it's action set pieces are cleverly
conceived and coherently executed in
ways that make them feel surprising mr.
Forester is more of a craftsman than a
visionary and while the film does not
try to extend the boundaries of
commercial entertainment it does what it
can to find interesting ways to pass the
time within them sound ghazal World War
Z often feels smaller and quieter than
it is because your attention is drawn to
details rather than show-stopping
spectacles or self important themes
